amendatorysection.catchline: State Board of Education; members; election.
amendatorysection.para: The State Board of Education shall be composed of eight members who shall be elected as provided in section 32-511. The Commissioner of Education shall not be a member of the State Board of Education.

crossreference.para: Creation, Article VII, section 3, Constitution of Nebraska.
Membership, requirements, Article VII, section 3, Constitution of Nebraska.
